description: New and improved version of a classic: the Runbold Zip Off Pants Men impress with their premium workmanship and an abrasion-proof stretch nylon material for greater freedom of movement and excellent comfort. Lots of movement calls for effective moisture management, a requirement addressed by the pants’ Midori treatment. Quick-drying and breathable properties also ensure greater comfort for the Runbold Zip Off Pants Men.
name: Mammut Runbold Zip Off Pants, Reg - Mens
